Managed.description: If true, this state does not handle transitions by itself

StepByStep.description:
Affects the StepByStep transition behaviour
If not set, inherits the setting from its parent FSM

transitions.description: A transition map, required if Managed is false

category.description: Overrides the default GUI category (i.e. {"FSM", name})

configs.description: Override configuration for the state running inside this FSM
